parks.title: Discover the best spaces for your pet in Málaga
parks.descriptionRich: Find <highlight>dog parks</highlight>, recreation areas, and <highlight>pet-friendly</highlight> spaces near you

about.title: About the project
paragraphs: MálagaDogParks was born as a personal project that combines my passion for web development and my love for dogs. Using official data from the Málaga City Council, I have created a modern platform that makes it easy to find safe and official dog-friendly spaces in our city.
This project is part of my developer portfolio, showcasing the use of modern technologies such as Next.js, Tailwind, and Python’s Folium library to create precise and functional interactive maps.
Beyond technology, I firmly believe that walking with our dogs is a unique opportunity to socialize, meet neighbors, and strengthen community ties in Málaga.

seo.defaultTitle: MálagaDogParks - Official Dog Parks in Málaga
seo.defaultDescription: Find the best official dog parks in Málaga. Your complete guide to dog-friendly spaces with up-to-date information.

cookie.title: Cookie Settings
cookie.description: We use first and third-party cookies to analyze our services and show you ads related to your preferences. You can configure or reject cookies by clicking the corresponding buttons.

types.necessaryDesc: Essential for the basic functioning of the website.
types.functionalDesc: Improve experience by remembering your preferences (language, region, etc.).
types.analyticsDesc: Help us understand how you use the site to improve it (Google Analytics).
types.marketingDesc: Allow personalized ads and measure their effectiveness.
